```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)

# Parameters
file_data <- here::here("data/cities.rds")
#===============================================================================

df <- read_rds(file_data)
```

The South Carolina City with the most evictions in 2016 is North Charleston.

```{r}

df %>% 
  count(
    geoid, 
    name, 
    name = "eviction_count", 
    wt = evictions, 
    sort = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
  
```
